oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Index to publications 1 - 5
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Patty, Dotty Matheny
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Digitized by the Internet Archive in 2010 with funding from Lyrasis Members and Sloan Foundation http://www.archive.org/details/publicationOOruth INDEX To Publications 1-5 Proposed Renovation of the Rutherford County Court House in 1908 976 •S57 R951P Ind. v. 1-5 c.2 a publication by the Rutherford County Historical Society Murfreesboro, Tennessee 1979 ABOUT TIE INDEX This Index, covering the first five regular publications of the Rutherford County Historical Society, provides a ready reference for those interested in lo-cating a particular article, the name of an individual, or other particular items relating to the history of the community. The Index was compiled after many hours of labor by Dotty Matheny Patty. It provides an invaluable companion volume to the highly informative and well received first five volumes prepared and issued by the Society. (Cover picture courtesy of Miss Louise Cawthon ) A Rutherford County Historical Publication Limited to 100 Copies 1979 LIBRARY MIDDLE TENNESSEE STATE UNIVERSITY MURFREESBOKO. TENNESSEE 371.10 TABLE OF CONTENTS SECTION PAGE 1. INDEX, RCHS PUBLICATION NO. 1 1 Contents--Pub.
